Reviews.Title: Luckily I am used to poor documentation and trial-and-error testing.
Reviews.Author: Not My Real Name "Really REALLY!"
Reviews.Content: Luckily I am used to poor documentation and trial-and-error testing.  This works OK.  The manual is almost usable for me.  It took almost 5 minutes to figure it out though.  Not a long time - but for something with 3 buttons this seems rather long.

Reviews.Title: lasted a few minutes!
Reviews.Author: WILLIAM OSBORNE
Reviews.Content: Upon recieving it, I charged it fully, and start recording It worked as planned.  I changed out the card for an 8GB, and haven't been able to get it to record again.

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: Alisa
Reviews.Content: Could not get this to work. I have waited to long to return. I will never buy one of these again. Waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Does not work!
Reviews.Author: Justin Ottmer
Reviews.Content: This product showed the charging light fine and the stop button seemed work fine but both the recording and picture button both were unresponsive. Don't waste your money! It is also not available for replacement.

Reviews.Title: doesn't work
Reviews.Author: martin carolan
Reviews.Content: camera turns on & charges battery,,, thats all !!!!!!Button to record does nothing !!!!! I put the sd card in correctly !!!!Package it was shipped in does not contain any website, phone number, address  to get refund or return info,,, just the box it came from asian country in.

Reviews.Title: Hard to operated
Reviews.Author: Julio
Reviews.Content: Is so hard to operated this spy camara is confused no can understand the manual I couldn't  make it to work

Reviews.Title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: I purchased this and was super excited to have a "spy" cam. The thing didn't even work.  Total waste of money!!!

Reviews.Title: no. 2
Reviews.Author: kev2coy
Reviews.Content: my second purchase first one lasted 3 months. broken english in the instuction manual.second purchase different video format plus video is not in hd. will not purchase any more.

Reviews.Title: Took one picture then stopped working
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: The device powered up, connected to the computer as a storage device, took one picture, then suddenly stopped working.  The instructions said to press the reset button which did nothing.  The quality of the picture was quite poor but not much can be expected from such a small camera.  The instructions were in very broken English and barely understandable.I am returning this and not looking for a replacement.  I do not recommend buying this.

Reviews.Title: stop and start when recording
Reviews.Author: jerry williams
Reviews.Content: i loved the design of the camera the recording part is were i had a little problem.no matter where i recorded the camera would pause . it would not keep going thru the whole recording without stopping.maybe the one i received just had a little problem. thanks.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: This camera's battery life is terrible. The instructions are obviously written by someone that doesn't have too firm of a grasp on the English language, as they are fairly difficult to understand.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: michael j cherry
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised. Buy a memory card w/ it. The light freezes sometimes. If it does that just reset it.

Reviews.Title: Does what is is supposed to
Reviews.Author: M. B. Martin "old geek author"
Reviews.Content: No idea how the charge will hold up, but I don't need all-day capabilities.  Functional camera, that's all I wanted.

Reviews.Title: its very good
Reviews.Author: osama
Reviews.Content: Hello dearI received my order, it is very good like what i want and i like it. I'll buy more thing form you in the future. thank you for help my.Best regards

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Shawn B. Hill
Reviews.Content: Nice for a toy, gift or the real thing. I have tested this key in meetings and other events. Video, sound, and quality work great. Ev

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy operation - press button once to take pictures, hold down the button to start a video.
Pin hole camera (it really looks like a normal BMW car key)
Comes with a free 2GB memory card.
Device supports up to 8GB micro SD card.
Windows and MAC compatible - works on 99% of computers
ProductInfo.Name: Car Key Spy Camera Video Recorder Motion Detect DVR, (2GB INCLUDED)
